activities: Boliven does not sell user information to third parties, and we protect the privacy of our members’ searches and work conducted through our site. We collect only the information we need to provide accurate invoices to our customers and to improve the quality and usefulness of our services to our members. As part of this Privacy Policy, Boliven complies with the Principles set forth in the U.S.-E.U. Safe Harbor Agreement concerning privacy standards.
